tokens.text: returns head y world-rotation of the ride of an entity

description: Returns the head y world-rotation of the ride of an entity, else it returns 0.0. First parameter only for horses, zombie horses, skeleton horses, donkeys and mules that clamps rotation in degrees. Takes one optional argument as a parameter.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Ride Head y Rotation
